origin.originsvoidends.dragonic.name: Dragonic
origin.originsvoidends.dragonic.descript: As half-human and half-Ender Dragon, the Dragonian lost their ability to fly a long time ago but still do their fire ball thing.
power.originsvoidends.fire_dragon_fireba: You shoot a small fire ball same as Ender dragon.
power.originsvoidends.hard_scale.name: Muscular
power.originsvoidends.hard_scale.descrip: You have 2 more hearts of health than humans.
